name: Ghostbusters VR: Showdown
description:
The next chapter is here. New York is in grave danger in the follow up to Ghostbusters VR! Act 2, Showdown, is a fast paced VR shooter where you’ll use your Ghostbusting skills to fend off a legion of New York’s finest ghouls. Blast your way through and face a thrilling VR showdown with the most threatening Marshmallow you’ll ever roast.
Showdown opens as you steer ecto-1 towards the terrifying ghost you let out of his trap, Mayhem. As Mayhem incites a ghost riot, you’ll have to blast waves of ghosts from every angle to have a shot at capturing Mayhem and cleaning up the mess you made.
Also available: Act 1 Firehouse - Ghostbusters VR: Now Hiring
